mods.name: Weapon Debug
description: Adds on-screen real-time weapon statistics and/or part attributes displays.
tagline: Adds on-screen real-time weapon statistics display.

mods.name: Time of Day Changer
description: Allows changing the current in-game time of day either to day, night, or forward in a fixed increment using hotkeys.
tagline: Allows changing the current in-game time of day.
